item.title: Strange GL Reconciliation
item.description: While the Reconcile to GL feature in Microsoft Dynamics GP is helpful, I’ve encountered some quirks. This tool simplifies subledger reconciliation by generating a spreadsheet of subledger and general ledger transactions, eliminating the need for manual Excel workarounds. To use it, select the module (Payables or Receivables Management), specify the date range, and input the relevant accounts. The resulting spreadsheet categorizes transactions as matched, potentially matched, or unmatched, aiding in identifying discrepancies.
